title: Vale Tudo
overview: Raquel, a hard-working woman who works as a tour guide in Foz do Iguaçu, Paraná. She believes that it is possible to succeed in life with dignity. On the other hand, her daughter, Maria de Fátima, a young woman uninterested in the routine of the quiet city of Paraná, dreams of becoming a digital influencer and getting rich at any cost.
